channel.title: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]
channel.description: How do I add 63 waves to fight caves. You guys, this will be really appreciated.

item.title: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:387097”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482890.msg3536572#msg3536572 date=1300591389]
Isn’t fight caves the mini game where you verse other players?
[/quote]
no… the one where you get fire cape (jad)[/quote]

Oh, sorry.
I was thinking of fightpits.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:387097”] int wave = 0; void spawnFightCaveWave () { switch (wave) { case 0: case 1: case 2: case 3: Server.NPCHandler.spawnNPC(x, y, npc, heightLevel); wave++; break; case 63: Server.NPCHandler.spawnNPC(x, y, npc, heightLevel); wave = 0; break; } } [/quote]
Where I add this?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]

item.title: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

int wave = 0;
void spawnFightCaveWave () 
{
    switch (wave)
    {
        case 0:
        case 1:
        case 2:
        case 3:
            Server.NPCHandler.spawnNPC(x, y, npc, heightLevel);
            wave++;
            break;
        case 63:
            Server.NPCHandler.spawnNPC(x, y, npc, heightLevel);
            wave = 0;
            break;
    }
}

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]How to add 63 Waves of Fight Caves[Delta]
